name: A MAN - Whose life is hard
name_original: A MAN - Whose life is hard
description:
A game made for the "Make something Horrible / Horrible Bundle" game creation contest (Canard PC). Here you have to help this man who has to survive through many painful situations. His life is hard, really hard...

Taking a shower, swash the train station, taking the bus, and so on. All of this happens in childish drawn levels while some childish drawn bombs will try to kill this Man, causing childish drawn explosions.

A game by Kijewoku : kijewoku.com

Music of : incompetech.com
